"The Time-Traveling Bunny's Great Adventure"odle: A video game where players control the Time-Traveling Bunny as he travels through different eras and locations, completing missions and collecting items.
"The Time-Traveling Bunnyodle": A virtual reality experience where players can step into the shoes of the Time-Traveling Bunny and explore different time periods and locations.
"The Time-Traveling Bunny's Time Capsule": A mobile app where users can create their own time capsule and fill it with items and messages to be opened in the future.
"The Time-Traveling Bunny's Time Travel Workshop": An interactive workshop where users can learn about the science of time travel and experiment with different time-traveling devices.
"The Time-Traveling Bunny's Time Travelodle": A social media platform where users can share their own time-traveling experiences and connect with other time travelers from around the world.
